content: **crocheted bag in drops safran the piece is worked with granny squares ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-353 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width = approx 36 cm height = approx 34 cm without strap **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150 g colour 18 off white 50 g colour 02 pink 50 g colour 09 navy blue 50 g colour 11 sunshine 50 g colour 13 raspberry 50 g colour 15 plum 50 g colour 22 light brown if you only use 1 colour you will need approx 250 g drops safran **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge ** 1 square measures approx 9 x 9 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
